name: From Dust (itch)
description:
1) Click the energy spirit (blue orbs) to begin the game
2) Click the bonfire (townCenter) and view the possible upgrades
3) click on an ally character to view their status, and set their profession
4) Click the buttons in the top right of the screen to speed up or slow down the game speed
5) Click the buttons on the left to open the hud interface to build plants and structures
6) Clicking Z saves the game
7) Clicking X loads the game
8) Clicking C Resets the game
9) Right click to spawn a few characters (there is a built in population limit based on town center level)
10) Click the middle mouse butto n (mouse wheel) to spawn enemies (warning I only recommend this after you have a high tiered military tower built)
11) When placing a structure to be built make sure there is space between other buildings, currently it checks based on the max tier size of the building (buildings tend to increase as the tier is raised, I will need to add more to the lower tiers to help visualize the width of the max tiers)
12) Building military towers and a forge are probably the best starting point
13) Allied characters can be dragged to locations by holding down the mouse while touching them
